thread.title: Indian Railways: Cops detain former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh for driving car on to Andheri railway platform
thread.title_full: Indian Railways: Cops detain former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh for driving car on to Andheri railway platform

author: FE Online
title: Indian Railways: Cops detain former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh for driving car on to Andheri railway platform
text:
India news Indian Railways: Cops detain former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh for driving car on to Andheri railway platform Indian Railways: Cops detain former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh for driving car on to Andheri railway platform Former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh was detained by cops late on Sunday night for driving his car straight into the Andheri railway station platform. By: FE Online | New Delhi | Published: February 20, 2017 1:05 PM Andheri railway platform. (ANI) 
Former Rajasthan Royals player Harmeet Singh was detained by cops late on Sunday night for driving his car straight into the Andheri railway station platform. There was panic among commuters on the platform and they ran from the sight as soon as Singhâ€™s car came speeding onto platform no. 1. Luckily no one was harmed and the Under 19 cricketer was able to control his car and stop it right next to the railway tracks. The police has taken the 24-year-old cricketer into custody for questioning and further interrogation and also to check whether or not he was under the influence of alcohol at the time of the incident. 
Further details awaited.
